text: Am I tripping? Or can we not add forms in custom modules that were created in the new form editor. If I want to add a form to a custom module, I have to use the legacy form tool?

Hey <@UB690RZA7>, tested it a few minutes ago. Have to confirm, that custom modules don't support the new form builder rn. The only option how to get the new forms into a custom module would be via (rich-)text field and pasting the embed code....

Major bummer

Thanks, Anton. The embed route is an option, albeit a bit of a hack. I wonder if HubSpot plans on supporting it in the future? Seems odd they would introduce that new form without the ability to add them within a custom module.
